learned_all_cards/head/description: You've learned all the cards in this deck. You should review cards to reinforce your memory!
learned_all_cards/head/title: There is no more cards to learn
reviewed_all_cards/head/description: You've reviewed all the cards in this deck today. Maybe it's time to learn new cards?
reviewed_all_cards/head/title: There is no more cards to review today
reviewed_and_learned_all_cards/head/desc: You've learned all the cards in this deck and there are no cards to review today. If you'd like to practice, you can start a random session. Don't worry - random sessions won't affect your review progress, so you can practice freely without consequences.
reviewed_and_learned_all_cards/head/titl: There is no more cards to review and learn
